title: A P–O functional group anchoring Pt–Co electrocatalyst for high-durability PEMFCs
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3099-3111
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04503J, Paper
Sheng-Nan Hu, Wei-Cheng Xu, Na Tian, Su-Min Chen, Meng-Ying Li, Jun-Fei Shen, Jin-Xia Lin, Shuai-Long Guo, Xiao-Yang Huang, Zhi-You Zhou, Shi-Gang Sun
The P–O functional group as a metal–support linkage suppresses effectively the migration and growth of nanoparticles, which endows PtCo/P2.73Ox–KB with remarkable durability in H2–air PEMFCs.
